title: AIR NEO AI-Powered Autofly™ Camera Drone only $129.97 this week
content:
Macworld

Taking high-in-the-sky photographs and videos used to be a pleasure reserved for high-budget productions. Now, you can easily take your image-capturing skills to the sky, and with the power of AI, you can do so with a ton of support. 

Until February 25, you can get the AIR NEO AI-Powered Autofly™ Camera Drone for only 129.97 (reg. $159). Equipped with a camera capable of taking 12MP photos and 1080p videos at a frame rate as fast as 30 FPS, this smart drone also pairs with its own Robust AirSelfie app to easily share your high-end content. 

This drone comes with 16GB of onboard storage so all your nature or film content is safely stowed away, as well as wireless connectivity of up to 60 feet. While you’re looking out over the horizon for great shots, the AI-powered auto-fly option on the AIR NEO will be there to support you, ensuring your drone enjoys a smoother flight. On top of it all, this drone’s lightweight size and included storage bag makes it easy to take on adventures of all kinds. 

Soar the skies and capture gorgeous imagery with help from AI.

Grab the AIR NEO AI-Powered Autofly™ Camera Drone for just $129.97 through February 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon needed.
